```{r}
load("data/faux_census.rda")
faux_census
```

```{r}
na_if(faux_census$income, 9999999)

faux_census %>% dplyr::mutate(income = na_if(income, 9999999))

faux_census %>% na_if_at("income", 9999999)
```

```{r}
faux_census %>% na_if_at("age", 2, 557)

faux_census %>% na_if_at("age", ~ . < 18, ~ . > 122)
faux_census %>% na_if_not_at("age", 18:122)
```

```{r}
faux_census %>% na_if_at("state", ~ nchar(.) > 2)
faux_census %>% na_if_not_at("state", ~ nchar(.) == 2)
```

```{r}
faux_census %>% dplyr::select(-state) %>% na_if_if(is.character, ~ nchar(.) > 25)
```
